publicationStmt.publisher: Wellcome Library; Bibliotheca Alexandrina; King's College London

msContents.summary: Tables in Arabic concerning the calendars, the seasons and horoscopes

msItem.title: Series of tables containing data on different calendars, seasons and horoscopes
msItem.incipit: f 1v.1 أوائل السنين والشهور العربيّة على تاريخ الهجرة النبوية

supportDesc.foliation: Foliation in black and red ink using Arabic numerals.

layout.locus: Columns made up of tables of varying sizes.

list.item: Tables determining the beginning of the years and months of the Arab calendar according to the Islamic calendar f. 1v.
Tables determining the beginning of the years and months of the Roman calendar according to the Islamic calendar f. 2r.
Tables determining the periods of the seasons of the year and the horoscopes ff. 2v-8r.

binding.p: 219 137 Modern paper binding; covers mixture of marbled and green paper.

revisionDesc.change: Updated record in accordance with Fihrist standards.
